events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle at an intersection on March 30th. Initial details about the accident were recorded.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying keywords mentioning car collision and vehicle damage.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim to ensure prompt assistance and customer support.
Agent acknowledged the receipt of the claim and informed the customer that the investigation process would begin shortly.
Requested accident report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of the police report from the customer to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the collision damage and an official police accident report.
The claims team began their investigation into the vehicle collision claim to validate damages and liability for the accident.
Investigation concluded verifying the extent of vehicle damage and confirming the fault as per the police report findings.
A settlement was proposed to cover the repair costs of the car based on the damage assessment and insurance policy terms.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and quick responses from the claims agent throughout the process.
Management approved the claim as per investigation findings and policy coverage, allowing the settlement payment to proceed.
The agreed payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the costs associated with the vehicle damage repairs.
The auto accident claim is now closed after successful payment and confirmation of repair commencement by the insured party.
